Making people aware is important, but more important is to convert awareness into action. Clean India - Is attitude change more important than the movement?

                                                                                   Firstly,it is a wonderful initiative by our Honourable Prime Minister Mr.Modi that is the "Swachh Bharat Abiyan"to see the clean and green India.Yes,attitude change is more important for an individual to accept the change.Making people aware is impotant,but at the same time we should try to see that the awareness is converted into action,if it is not converted to action or it is making any difference then awareness goes in vain.The government is taking necessary measures to achieve the mission-clean India.

                                                                                   They are using every possible medium to promote Swachh Bharat not only in urban areas but also in Rural areas.They are educating rural people to construct wash rooms in their houses and about mainitaining hygeine environment around them.They also constructed toilets on roads and educating people to use them.Here the challenge is to convert the awareness into action,that how far the people are using the public toilets or not. 

                                                                                  In budget 2016 they alloted Rs.9000crore for Swachh Bharat Abiyan  to bring about change in the country.They also took initiative to clean Ganga river and bring awareness about not using plastic or throughing plastic in the river.Now Telangana government as taken an initiative to clean Hyderabad city known as "Swachh Hyderabad".And also brining awareness to use recycled products like recycled paper bags jute bags etc;

                                                                                  It is just a begining and the citizens of India should also feel responsible and start using dust bins and public toilets and not spoiling the roads .
